text.english: As for me, I will see Your face in righteousness; I shall be satisfied when I awake in Your likeness. You have tested my heart; You have visited me in the night; You have tried me and have found nothing; I have purposed that my mouth shall not transgress.
text.arabic: أَمَّا أَنَا فَبِالْبِرِّ أَنْظُرُ وَجْهَكَ. أَشْبَعُ إِذَا اسْتَيْقَظْتُ بِشَبَهِكَ. جَرَّبْتَ قَلْبِي. تَعَهَّدْتَهُ لَيْلاً. مَحَّصْتَنِي. لاَ تَجِدُ فِيَّ ذُمُوماً. لاَ يَتَعَدَّى فَمِي.
